amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit authorization for the Recreation Fee Demonstration Program to activities under the jurisdiction of the National Park Service only.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in the Congressional Record of July 16, 2003.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 241 (Roll no. 377).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. DeFazio.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 241 (Roll no. 377).
